title: Crime Alert 02.23.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.23.21
description:
Driver charged with hate crime after intentionally hitting of duty cop on motorcycle. Couple get into an argument over toilet paper. Charges applied.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
